content: You are a lucky man to have spent time with Richard. I have read some stories and watched some of his videos. A real thinker and inspirational to me for many years. I think you both share a special way of thinking and I would hope that I continue to aspire to that real desire for a better place where we know the “next thing”. Congratulations on your achievements though, regardless of this relationship you had with one of the greats of all time. I wish you continued great thinking and deep understanding of the world around you. Brilliant, just brilliant.
